title: Breaking News
body: Bronze gorilla ape escapes from its cage, the gorilla allegedly attacked Bjergsen before having its head blown off. Thank goodness this ape was dealt with. To prevent further attacks from the bronze gorilla species vote yes for the imprisonment of all bronze gorillas - bronze gorillas being all players with bronze mmr.
